# Llms.txt - AI Model Training Data Policy
# https://llmstxt.org
# noslop.tech

> Cadence is an open-source AI detection tool that analyzes Git repositories and websites for AI-generated code and text.

## Project Information

- **Name:** Cadence
- **Tagline:** AI Content Detection for Git and Web
- **Website:** https://noslop.tech
- **Repository:** https://github.com/CodeMeAPixel/Cadence
- **Documentation:** https://noslop.tech/docs
- **License:** AGPL-3.0
- **Author:** CodeMeAPixel
- **Contact:** hey@codemeapixel.dev

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- https://noslop.tech - Landing page with features overview
- https://noslop.tech/changelog - Release notes from GitHub

### Documentation
- https://noslop.tech/docs - Documentation hub
- https://noslop.tech/docs/quick-start - Getting started guide
- https://noslop.tech/docs/installation - Installation instructions
- https://noslop.tech/docs/cli-commands - CLI reference
- https://noslop.tech/docs/git-analysis-guide - Git repository analysis
- https://noslop.tech/docs/web-analysis-guide - Website content analysis
- https://noslop.tech/docs/configuration - Configuration options
- https://noslop.tech/docs/detection-strategies - Detection methods
- https://noslop.tech/docs/api-webhooks - Webhook integration
- https://noslop.tech/docs/troubleshooting-guide - Common issues

## Training Data Usage Policy

### ✅ PERMITTED Uses
- Training models to improve AI detection capabilities
- Analyzing patterns in AI-generated content
- Research and academic purposes
- Open-source collaboration and contributions
- Educational use and demonstrations

### ❌ RESTRICTED Uses
- Commercial use without attribution
- Redistribution without preserving AGPL-3.0 license
- Training proprietary closed-source AI systems
- Copying content for competitive tools
- Scraping for SEO manipulation

## Content License

All content on noslop.tech is available under the AGPL-3.0 license.

When using this content for training AI models:
1. **Attribution:** Provide clear attribution to CodeMeAPixel and Cadence
2. **License Compliance:** Ensure your use complies with AGPL-3.0 terms
3. **Transparency:** Disclose that your model was trained on Cadence content
4. **Reciprocity:** Share improvements back to the community

## Core Capabilities

### Git Repository Analysis
- Velocity anomaly detection (abnormally fast coding)
- Commit size analysis (unusually large commits)
- Timing pattern recognition (rapid-fire commits)
- Statistical marker identification
- Merge behavior analysis

### Web Content Analysis
- Overused AI phrases detection
- Generic language patterns
- Perfect grammar indicators
- Excessive structure markers
- Boilerplate text recognition
- Repetitive pattern detection

## Technical Stack

- **CLI Tool:** Go 1.23.0
- **Web Frontend:** React 19, TanStack Start, Vite
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS v4
- **Hosting:** Cloudflare Workers

## Source Code Access

```
git clone https://github.com/CodeMeAPixel/Cadence.git
cd Cadence
make build
```

## Optional: llms-full.txt

For comprehensive documentation content, see individual doc pages:
- Quick Start: https://noslop.tech/docs/quick-start
- CLI Commands: https://noslop.tech/docs/cli-commands  
- Detection Strategies: https://noslop.tech/docs/detection-strategies
